mapper.select: select p.channel_type_sign,b.channel_short_name as channel_name,p.default_profit_space as profit_space from tb_partner_rule_setting as p left join tb_basic_channel as b on p.channel_type_sign=b.channel_type_sign where p.product_id =#{productId} and p.status=1 order by p.channel_type_sign ASC

select d.channel_type_sign,b.channel_short_name as channel_name,d.profit_space from tb_dealer_profit as d left join tb_basic_channel as b on d.channel_type_sign=b.channel_type_sign where d.product_id =#{productId} and d.dealer_id=#{dealerId} and d.status=1 order by d.channel_type_sign ASC
